mapper.select: SELECT poll_no as no, party_no as "party.no", user_id as "user.id", poll_title as title, poll_description as description, is_anonymous as anonymous, is_duplicable as duplicable, created_at as createdAt, ended_at as endedAt, post_id as "post.id" FROM poll WHERE post_id = #{value}
